name: Hit the middle
description:
Hit the middle! You need to hit the black circle. Once done, your score will go 1 up, but the dartboard will get smaller. A simple game.

I am Safegame, a small game making studio. I want to make better games, and you can help me. Even with just 20 cents, i can work harder on a game. I am planning to make 3d games. Thanks for understanding, Rijk (the maker of Safegame).
